name: Medium Card
description: An elevated card with a title and description, that takes up half of its container.

leftDescription.label: Left description
leftDescription.description: Text to display on the left

rightDescription.label: Right description
rightDescription.description: Text to display on the right

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Icon to display on the top right

elevation.label: Elevation
elevation.description: Elevation of the component. A number 0-3.

name: Large Card
description: An elevated card with a title and description, that takes up its full container.

leftDescription.description: Text to display on the left

rightDescription.label: Right description
rightDescription.description: Text to display on the right

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Icon to display on the top right

elevation.label: Elevation
elevation.description: Elevation of the component. A number 0-3.
